column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Excellent.  I always order a pie for carry out
column3: drink a beer at the bar
column4: and then head home.  The bartenders are fantastic!  They are easily some of the best bartenders in the city.  Everyone is extremely friendly.  The deep dish is what they are known for
column5: but I've become a bigger fan of the thin crust.  The deep dish is still really good
column6: but the thin crust has been just-right this fall.  I was also pleasantly surprised to find the Italian beef sandwich is very good.
